Game rules has changed! Now you can steal other player's rocket, escape and Win!
Added: player profile, leveling up, achievements, leaderboards, free chest every 4 hours, whole new Armory menu. Added dances :)
Improved battle mechanics. Upgraded mi

Game rules has changed! Now you can steal other player's rocket, escape and Win!
Added: player profile, leveling up, achievements, leaderboards, free chest every 4 hours, whole new Armory menu. Added dances :)
Improved battle mechanics. Upgraded mi

- Biggest changes in teamplay, now you can build a party up to 3 players right in the lobby before the match.
- Added Team Marker button, to place 3d arrow for your teammates.
- Removed friendly fire (can't kill your teammate).
- Max players per

- Biggest changes in teamplay, now you can build a party up to 3 players right in the lobby before the match.
- Added Team Marker button, to place 3d arrow for your teammates.
- Removed friendly fire (can't kill your teammate).
- Max players per

- Added player Avatars (find them in Legendary chest).
- Added country flags.
- Added global lighting change over time (day to night)
- Improved items pickup interface, added item drop (hold item slot to drop).
- Added ammo count to each weap

- Added player Avatars (find them in Legendary chest).
- Added country flags.
- Added global lighting change over time (day to night)
- Improved items pickup interface, added item drop (hold item slot to drop).
- Added ammo count to each weap

- Added change controls layout screen. Added support for left handed controls.
- Added new 79 new characters! Added skin color setting.
- Added new achievements.
- Leagues tweaks and improvements.
- Shotguns close combat have been improved.

Added many new weapons. Regular ones and secret weapons, which can be found in new rare buildings\objects.
Added trip mines. Bazooka now have less ammo and smaller spawn chance.
Reward Doubler changed to VIP.
Added Rainy weather effect, also dead

- Added clan system! create or join clan and compete in clan leaderboards! Min level 15 to create a clan, min level 8 to join a clan.
- Trip mines now can't be triggered by teammate.
- Added grenades\molotov throw trajectory preview.
- Mega shiel

- Added clan system! create or join clan and compete in clan leaderboards! Min level 15 to create a clan, min level 8 to join a clan.
- Trip mines now can't be triggered by teammate.
- Added grenades\molotov throw trajectory preview.
- Mega shiel

This Rocket Royale update is mostly about various visual improvements:
- Improved players animations.
- Improved visual and audio victory effect.
- Added censored blood option.
- Improved water visual.
- The night has become brighter.

- Improved water visual.

New big update 1.9.7 has arrived!
- Brand new "Space Station" teamplay map!
- Added Daily Challenges, small tasks to complete every day.
- VIP benefits increased.
- New main screen interface design.
- Added YouTube feed with recent RR

- Capture The Flag LTM bug fixes and improvements.
- Added more sounds to various emotes.
- Fix: App crash on iPhone 6 and older.
- Fix: player's buildings did not break consecutively.
- Network synchronization fix: sometimes enemies shoo

- VIP Battle Pass with tons of new customizable content!
- Video of the day on RR Youtube (most viewed).
- Tap on item in chests / battle pass for 3d model preview.
- New types of houses in RR mode.
- Player builds more easy to place on c

- New types of houses in RR mode.
- Player builds more easy to place on c

- Added Scooter vehicle, can be found in RR mode.
- New LTM "1 shot 1 kill" with new instant kill Barret sniper rifle.
- New Anubis Arena map, which appear in Arena and LTM modes.
- New types of houses in RR mode.
- Improved grass.
- Stick

- New LTM "1 shot 1 kill" with new instant kill Barret sniper rifle.

- New types of houses in RR mode.

- Stick

- The biggest addition this year! Whole new RR map "Sandy Desert!"
- Added many new events and houses! Find them :)
- Added new vehicle: Tractor.
- Trees and bushes appearance reworked (not available at low graphics).
- Added new item: Bea

- The biggest addition this year! Whole new RR map "Sandy Desert!"
- Added many new events and houses! Find them :)
- Added new vehicle: Tractor.
- Trees and bushes appearance reworked (not available at low graphics).
- Added new item: Bea

Merry Christmas and Happy New Year everyone! Brand new update is here:
- Special winter event starting 18 Dec - 8 Jan. Unlock NY pickaxe and backpack!
- New winter creature: Snow Giant!
- New jetpack "JumpJet".
- New weapon: G3 Sniper Rifl

Merry Christmas and Happy New Year everyone! Brand new update is here:
- Special winter event starting 18 Dec - 8 Jan. Unlock NY pickaxe and backpack!
- New winter creature: Snow Giant!
- New jetpack "JumpJet".
- New weapon: G3 Sniper Rifl

- New Capture The Flag TLM map "Sky Fort"!
- Added chat ignore list, to mute particular toxic players :\
- Balance: G3 sniper base ammo 5>4. Reload speed -20%.
- Balance: Snow Giant can't use jetpacks.
- Various bug fixes.

- New Capture The Flag TLM map "Sky Fort"!
- Added chat ignore list, to mute particular toxic players :\
- Balance: G3 sniper base ammo 5>4. Reload speed -20%.
- Balance: Snow Giant can't use jetpacks.
- Various bug fixes.

- New Core Wars map! Sky Temple.
- 5 new character skins.
- New vehicle at Sandy Desert: ATV.
- Dummy Decoy improved: now it looks like a player skin.
- New weapon: Quad Launcher! Less powerful than Bazooka, but fires faster.
- Balance

- New Core Wars map! Sky Temple.
- 5 new character skins.
- New vehicle at Sandy Desert: ATV.
- Dummy Decoy improved: now it looks like a player skin.
- New weapon: Quad Launcher! Less powerful than Bazooka, but fires faster.
- Balance

- Armory items that are not owned have been moved to the new "shop" screen.
- Fixed graphics glitches at iPhone 5.
